case.title: come see the rolling stones with me tomorrow - m4w - 33 (london)
case.text:
So I have a spare ticket to see the rolling stones tomorrow at Hyde Park tomorrow.
Are there any single ladies, who are into the Stones, want to come with me?
Ticket is Â£70 pound. It would just be nice to go with someone who is cool, into their music and most importantly is a stones fan.
Age, race is not issue.
Send me a pic if you want. Put your favourite rolling stones track in the subject header so that I know your real.
Thanks for reading.
